pr_title: Use objdump on Android to check static native libraries

timeline.message: Add showSevere to show or not the severe message in case of process failure
Don’t show severe message when checking native libs on Linux
Add objdump to Android, and check native libraries

timeline.bodyText: shouldn't this be in Constants.Profile (full name)
timeline.author: johanvos

replies.bodyText: We have Constants.PROFILE_ANDROID, but that is only for android. The target triplet is created with Triplet(Constants.Profiles.ANDROID), based on three constants, so probably we could have all possible triplets names as constants?
replies.author: jperedadnr
jperedadnr

timeline.author: johanvos

replies.bodyText: using configuration.getHostTriplet() we get the Linux triplet, right, I'll change it
replies.author: jperedadnr

timeline.bodyText: better to replace with the getArch() on the targetTriplet (e.g. when we support x86-64 emulator/devices)
timeline.author: johanvos
